mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT ART.ART_NO, ART.SELLER_NO, ART.CATEGORY_NO, ART.TITLE, ART.CONTENTS, ART.ART_TYPE, ART.WIDTH, ART.HEIGHT, AUC.AUCTION_NO, AUC.START_PRICE, AUC.BUY_PRICE, AUC.START_AT, AUC.END_AT, AUC.STATUS FROM ART_T ART INNER JOIN AUCTION_T AUC ON ART.ART_NO = AUC.ART_NO WHERE AUC.STATUS = 0 AND ART.SELLER_NO = #{sellerNo})

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ART_NO) FROM (SELECT ART.ART_NO, ART.SELLER_NO, ART.CATEGORY_NO, ART.TITLE, ART.CONTENTS, ART.ART_TYPE, ART.WIDTH, ART.HEIGHT, AUC.AUCTION_NO, AUC.START_PRICE, AUC.BUY_PRICE, AUC.START_AT, AUC.END_AT, AUC.STATUS, BID.BID_NO, BID.BIDDER_NO, BID.PRICE, BID.BID_AT, BID.POSTCODE, BID.ROAD_ADDRESS, BID.JIBUN_ADDRESS, BID.DETAIL_ADDRESS FROM ART_T ART INNER JOIN AUCTION_T AUC ON ART.ART_NO = AUC.ART_NO RIGHT OUTER JOIN BID_T BID ON AUC.AUCTION_NO = BID.AUCTION_NO WHERE AUC.STATUS = 0 AND BID.BIDDER_NO = #{bidderNo})

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT ART.ART_NO, ART.SELLER_NO, ART.TITLE, ART.CONTENTS, AUC.AUCTION_NO, AUC.END_AT, AUC.STATUS, B.BID_NO, B.BIDDER_NO, B.PRICE AS MY_PRICE, B.BID_AT, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY ART.ART_NO ORDER BY B.PRICE DESC) AS RN FROM ART_T ART INNER JOIN AUCTION_T AUC ON ART.ART_NO = AUC.AUCTION_NO INNER JOIN BID_T B ON AUC.AUCTION_NO = B.AUCTION_NO WHERE B.BIDDER_NO = #{bidderNo}) WHERE RN = 1

SELECT Q1.ART_NO, Q1.TITLE, Q1.CONTENTS, Q1.BID_AT, Q1.MY_PRICE, Q2.PRICE, Q1.STATUS, Q1.END_AT, Q1.AUCTION_NO FROM (SELECT ART_NO, SELLER_NO, TITLE, CONTENTS, AUCTION_NO, END_AT, STATUS, BID_NO, BIDDER_NO, MY_PRICE, BID_AT, RN1, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY BID_AT ASC) AS RN FROM (SELECT ART.ART_NO, ART.SELLER_NO, ART.TITLE, ART.CONTENTS, AUC.AUCTION_NO, AUC.END_AT, AUC.STATUS, B.BID_NO, B.BIDDER_NO, B.PRICE AS MY_PRICE, B.BID_AT, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY ART.ART_NO ORDER BY B.PRICE DESC) AS RN1 FROM ART_T ART INNER JOIN AUCTION_T AUC ON ART.ART_NO = AUC.AUCTION_NO INNER JOIN BID_T B ON AUC.AUCTION_NO = B.AUCTION_NO WHERE B.BIDDER_NO = #{bidderNo}) WHERE RN1 = 1) Q1 LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT ART_NO, PRICE FROM (SELECT ART.ART_NO, ART.SELLER_NO, ART.TITLE, ART.CONTENTS, AUC.AUCTION_NO, AUC.END_AT, AUC.STATUS, B.BID_NO, B.BIDDER_NO, B.PRICE, B.BID_AT, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY ART.ART_NO ORDER BY B.PRICE DESC) AS RN2 FROM ART_T ART INNER JOIN AUCTION_T AUC ON ART.ART_NO = AUC.AUCTION_NO INNER JOIN BID_T B ON AUC.AUCTION_NO = B.AUCTION_NO) WHERE RN2 = 1) Q2 ON Q1.ART_NO = Q2.ART_NO WHERE RN BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}

SELECT AUCTION_IMAGE_NO, AUCTION_NO, PATH, FILESYSTEM_NAME, IMAGE_ORIGINAL_NAME, HAS_THUMBNAIL FROM AUCTION_IMAGE_T WHERE AUCTION_NO = #{auctionNo} AND AUCTION_IMAGE_NO = (SELECT MIN(AUCTION_IMAGE_NO) FROM AUCTION_IMAGE_T WHERE AUCTION_NO = #{auctionNo})

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT ART.ART_NO, ART.SELLER_NO, ART.CATEGORY_NO, ART.TITLE, ART.CONTENTS, ART.ART_TYPE, ART.WIDTH, ART.HEIGHT, AUC.AUCTION_NO, AUC.START_PRICE, AUC.BUY_PRICE, AUC.START_AT, AUC.END_AT, AUC.STATUS FROM ART_T ART INNER JOIN AUCTION_T AUC ON ART.ART_NO = AUC.ART_NO WHERE ART.SELLER_NO = #{sellerNo})

SELECT AUCTION_NO, TITLE, CONTENTS, START_AT, START_PRICE, PRICE, STATUS, END_AT FROM (SELECT A.AUCTION_NO, A.TITLE, A.CONTENTS, A.START_AT, A.START_PRICE, A.END_AT, A.STATUS, A.SELLER_NO, A.ART_NO, MAX(B.PRICE) AS PRICE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.START_AT DESC) AS RN FROM (SELECT AUC.AUCTION_NO, AUC.START_PRICE, AUC.START_AT, AUC.END_AT, AUC.STATUS, ART.TITLE, ART.CONTENTS, ART.SELLER_NO, ART.ART_NO FROM AUCTION_T AUC INNER JOIN ART_T ART ON AUC.ART_NO = ART.ART_NO) A LEFT OUTER JOIN BID_T B ON A.AUCTION_NO = B.AUCTION_NO WHERE SELLER_NO = #{sellerNo} GROUP BY A.AUCTION_NO, A.TITLE, A.CONTENTS, A.START_AT, A.START_PRICE, A.END_AT, A.STATUS, A.SELLER_NO, A.ART_NO) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT A.DRAW_NO, A.CATEGORY_NO, A.TITLE, A.PRICE, A.CONTENTS, A.WIDTH, A.HEIGHT, A.WORK_TERM, A.SELLER_NO, C.CATEGORY_NAME FROM (SELECT D.DRAW_NO, D.CATEGORY_NO, D.TITLE, D.PRICE, D.CONTENTS, D.WIDTH, D.HEIGHT, D.WORK_TERM, D.SELLER_NO FROM DRAW_T D LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_T USR ON D.SELLER_NO = USR.USER_NO) A INNER JOIN CATEGORY_T C ON A.CATEGORY_NO = C.CATEGORY_NO WHERE A.SELLER_NO = #{sellerNo})

SELECT A.DRAW_NO, A.CATEGORY_NO, A.TITLE, A.PRICE, A.CONTENTS, A.WIDTH, A.HEIGHT, A.WORK_TERM, A.USER_NO, A.NICKNAME, A.NAME, A.EMAIL, C.CATEGORY_NAME FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY DRAW_NO DESC) AS RN, D.DRAW_NO, D.CATEGORY_NO, D.TITLE, D.PRICE, D.CONTENTS, D.WIDTH, D.HEIGHT, D.WORK_TERM,USR.USER_NO, USR.NICKNAME, USR.NAME, USR.EMAIL FROM DRAW_T D LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_T USR ON D.SELLER_NO = USR.USER_NO WHERE USR.USER_NO = #{sellerNo}) A INNER JOIN CATEGORY_T C ON A.CATEGORY_NO = C.CATEGORY_NO WHERE A.RN BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end} ORDER BY A.DRAW_NO DESC

SELECT DRAW_IMAGE_NO, DRAW_NO, PATH, FILESYSTEM_NAME, IMAGE_ORIGINAL_NAME, HAS_THUMBNAIL FROM DRAW_IMAGE_T WHERE DRAW_NO = #{drawNo} AND DRAW_IMAGE_NO = (SELECT MIN(DRAW_IMAGE_NO) FROM DRAW_IMAGE_T WHERE DRAW_NO = #{drawNo})

SELECT A.DRAW_NO, A.CATEGORY_NO, C.CATEGORY_NAME, A.TITLE, A.CONTENTS, A.PRICE, A.ORDER_NO, A.BUYER_NO, A.ORDER_DATE, A.RECEIVE_EMAIL FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY ORDER_DATE DESC) AS RN, D.DRAW_NO, D.CATEGORY_NO, D.TITLE, D.CONTENTS, D.PRICE, DO.ORDER_NO, DO.BUYER_NO, DO.ORDER_DATE, DO.RECEIVE_EMAIL FROM DRAW_T D RIGHT OUTER JOIN DRAW_ORDER_T DO ON D.DRAW_NO = DO.DRAW_NO WHERE BUYER_NO = #{buyerNo}) A INNER JOIN CATEGORY_T C ON A.CATEGORY_NO = C.CATEGORY_NO WHERE A.RN BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end} ORDER BY ORDER_DATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT E.EMONEY_NO, E.USER_NO, E.EMONEY_HISTORY, E.EMONEY_DATE FROM EMONEY_T E RIGHT OUTER JOIN USER_T U ON E.USER_NO = U.USER_NO WHERE U.USER_NO = #{userNo})

SELECT SUM(A.EMONEY_HISTORY) FROM (SELECT E.EMONEY_HISTORY, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY E.EMONEY_NO DESC) AS RN FROM EMONEY_T E RIGHT OUTER JOIN USER_T U ON E.USER_NO = U.USER_NO WHERE U.USER_NO = #{userNo}) A WHERE RN BETWEEN #{no} AND (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EMONEY_T WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo})

SELECT EMONEY_NO, USER_NO, EMONEY_HISTORY, EMONEY_DATE FROM (SELECT E.EMONEY_NO, E.USER_NO, E.EMONEY_HISTORY, E.EMONEY_DATE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY E.EMONEY_NO DESC) AS RN FROM EMONEY_T E RIGHT OUTER JOIN USER_T U ON E.USER_NO = U.USER_NO WHERE U.USER_NO = #{userNo}) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
